Kevin De Bruyne ranks Premier League defenders and midfielders, his answers sure to cause a stir

Football Emily · 26/08/2023 · Man City

﻿In an exchange program with Sky Sports, Kevin De Bruyne believes that Bruno Fernandes is the number one creative star in the Premier League today.

Specifically, when MC Sky Sports gave three names including Bruno Fernandes, Martin Odegaard and James Maddison to rank, De Bruyne did not hesitate to choose the Man Utd star at number one, while the Arsenal conductor was behind.

De Bruyne explained: "Fernandes is clearly a creative machine. He likes to take risks and I like that. It's important that Fernandes has maintained this style of play for a very long time."

The Belgian midfielder admits Odegaard is also really creative, but this player is strongest in his ability to control the game. Meanwhile, De Bruyne said that Maddison is also very good, but needs to prove more capable when playing for a big club.

Since joining Man Utd, Fernandes has played 187 matches and has 54 assists of his own. The case of Fernandes is always controversial, but it cannot be denied that the Portuguese star has always proved important in the Man Ud squad.
